text:
<ex>This spell cannot be attached to a unit that already has a spell with the word "Inversion" in its title attached to it.</ex>
<ex>When attaching this spell to a unit that has the Illusion ability, the player that played this spell may select 2 Illusion dice in their exhausted pool and place them into their active pool on a side of their choice.</ex>
<in>Switch this unit's printed attack and life values.</in>
title: Body Inversion
